item.title: Introducing: That Moment When
item.description: Introducing That Moment When: Stories of specific and honest relational touchpoints that changed a person’s life. All Christians have a story about how they came to know God. But those stories aren’t always simple. They can be complicated, counterintuitive, even painful. In this podcast, we’ll hear from Lecrae, Barnabas Piper, Christina Im, Portia Collins, Trevin Wax, and others about that one moment in their lives when everything changed. But more importantly, how every little moment in our lives matters. Listen to That Moment When today!

item.content:encoded:
Introducing That Moment When: Stories of specific and honest relational touchpoints that changed a person’s life. 

All Christians have a story about how they came to know God. But those stories aren’t always simple. They can be complicated, counterintuitive, even painful. 

In this podcast, we’ll hear from Lecrae, Barnabas Piper, Christina Im, Portia Collins, Trevin Wax, and others about that one moment in their lives when everything changed. But more importantly, how every little moment in our lives matters.

Listen to That Moment When today!

item.title: Introducing One Minute With the Bible
item.description: One Minute With the Bible is a new podcast project from the Christian Standard Bible. You'll find short episodes organized by themes in the Bible with several Scripture passages. Listen to an episode when you find it convenient as something to dwell on, or listen to every episode as they release daily and you'll make it through the Bible in a year.
item.itunes:author: Christian Standard Bible
item.itunes:summary: One Minute With the Bible is a new podcast project from the Christian Standard Bible. You'll find short episodes organized by themes in the Bible with several Scripture passages. Listen to an episode when you find it convenient as something to dwell on, or listen to every episode as they release daily and you'll make it through the Bible in a year.
